Articles.Content:
I had planned yesterday of two streams (they showed up yesterday...), one Factorio and one Starmade (By the "Recommended streamers It seems this is allowed) and now they disappeared! My first livestream goes live in 3 hrs...

I'll try re-inputing them. Was there some sort of moderator approval needed? Or is it because im streaming on youtube? After re-submitting, they are there, but don't know for how long.

Edited August 11, 2014 by The Destroyer
I removed them, I forgot to notify you about it, sorry. The streaming calendar is meant for KSP streams only

I removed them, I forgot to notify you about it, sorry. The streaming calendar is meant for KSP streams only

Hmph, then why did I (more often than ksp) see in "Featured streamers" Minecraft, league of legends, etc.
Featured Streamers displays those streamers affiliated directly with KSPTV, and the sidebar will display any ongoing streams with those users as a sort of thank-you to those people.

Hmph, then why did I (more often than ksp) see in "Featured streamers" Minecraft, league of legends, etc.

What Vexx said, basically, but I'll discuss it with Rowsdower and get back to you on it
